Actions.Name: Golden Hand
Actions.Description: The wright transmutes an object in range 8 into solid gold. Characters standing adjacent to it count as holding a valuables token. This effect ends at the end of combat.

Actions.Name: Flesh to Metal
Actions.Description: A foe in range 8 must save. On a successful save, they are shattered. On a failed save, they begin turning into solid gold. At the end of their turn, remove and replace their character with a size 1 destructible object with 10 hp. Until the terrain piece is destroyed, they cannot take a turn. When it's destroyed, return them to the battlefield. Characters standing adjacent to the terrain piece count as holding a valuables token.
